The Easter egg to unlock all extra achievements is 7L.
Reach Level 1 and start your adventure in the world of Tapples.
Reach Level 2 and continue to uncover the mysteries of the Tapples.
Reach Level 3 and watch your Tapple skills blossom! You're growing faster than a Tapple tree in spring!
Reach Level 4 and delve deeper into the diverse world of Tapple. You're on a fruitful journey!
Reach Level 5 and embark on a Tapple-tastic journey. You're trekking through Tapple terrain with style!
Reach Level 6 and claim a triumphant victory in the Tapple world. You're halfway to being a Tapple legend!
Reach Level 7 and become a Tapple titan. Your collection skills are larger than life!
Reach Level 8 and achieve guru status among Tapple collectors. Your wisdom in Tapples is unmatched!
Reach Level 9 and achieve mastery over the Tapple sets, becoming a true legend. You've taken a big bite out of the Tapple world!
Reach Level 10 and display virtuoso-level skills in Tapple collection. You're playing a symphony of success!
